features: Daily Facial Moisturizer | Control oil and shine with this daily facial moisturizer with a gel-like formula that absorbs quickly into the skin for a non-greasy finish.
Balancing and Hydrating Ingredients | Made with Calamine, Green Tea, and Aloe to help reduce excess oil production and breakouts while repairing and hydrating the skin.
For Oily, Blemish-Prone Skin | Calm blemish-prone, oily skin and minimize oiliness without drying out or irritating the skin.
Natural Origin Ingredients | Made with 90% natural ingredients with a lightweight, cooling formula to hydrate the skin and balance sebum production.

For All Skin Types | Great for all skin types including especially acne-prone, oily skin. Hydrates the skin with a non-greasy feel. Mineral oil-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, and cruelty-free and vegan.
body.description: Dermafix Blemish Moisturizer Oily Skin Control and Blemish Care Daily Moisturizer The Hanhoo Dermafix Blemish Moisturizer is a light, fast-absorbing gel-like moisturizer made to soothe and calm acne-prone skin and minimize shine. Made with Calamine and Green Tea to help balance oil production to reduce excess oiliness and acne breakouts. The reparative ingredients like Aloe and Centella Asiatica help minimize redness and irritation for a cooling breakout treatment. Apply daily to help keep shine in check and give blemish-prone skin much needed relief. Daily facial moisturizer Oily skin control and blemish care Calms acne swelling and reduces redness Calamine and Green Tea reduce excess oil Aloe and Centella Asiatica soothes and repairs the skin Cruelty free and vegan skin care

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Be You. Be Hanhoo. Hanhoo is an Asian-owned clean skincare brand that believes in achieving healthy skin. We strive to break down the idea that perfect skin is free of textures, pores, and spots. Real skin has visible pores, acne scars, and hyperpigmentation, but that doesn’t make it any less beautiful. As a socially conscious brand, we encourage all people to embrace their unique skin. Dermafix Blemish Moisturizer Oily Skin Control and Blemish Care Daily Moisturizer The Hanhoo Dermafix Blemish Moisturizer is a light, fast-absorbing gel-like moisturizer made to soothe and calm acne-prone skin and minimize shine. Made with Calamine and Green Tea to help balance oil production to reduce excess oiliness and acne breakouts. The reparative ingredients like Aloe and Centella Asiatica help minimize redness and irritation for a cooling breakout treatment. Apply daily to help keep shine in check and give blemish-prone skin much needed relief. Daily facial moisturizer Oily skin control and blemish care Calms acne swelling and reduces redness Calamine and Green Tea reduce excess oil Aloe and Centella Asiatica soothes and repairs the skin Cruelty free and vegan skin care

Follow the Routine: Toner - Prep and Purify the Skin Shake toner bottle to activateApply the toner to cotton round or palmsGently apply over face Moisturizer - Control Oil and Breakouts After cleansing and toning, apply moisturizer to skinUse day and night Sheet Mask - Soothe and Cool the Skin Apply the sheet mask to the faceLeave on for 10 to 15 minutesPat remaining essence into the skin

FAQs Q: Will this leave oily skin looking greasy? A: No, the Hanhoo Dermafix Moisturizer helps control excess oil and reduce shine. The light, gel-like texture absorbs well into the skin. Q: Does this moisturizer help with acne prone skin? A: Yes, our moisturizer has ingredients like Green Tea, Calamine, and Centella Asiatica for effective oily skin control and gentle blemish care. Q: Can I use this moisturizer if I have cystic acne? A: We recommend consulting a dermatologist before using this moisturizer on skin with cystic acne.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hoy usé por primera vez éste producto, noté que hidrata sin dejar la piel grasa y me ayuda a controlar la grasa en mi piel, ojalá siga asi

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This helps heal my blemishes while moisturizing my face. All natural ingredients which I love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favorite
reviews.reviewText: This helps get rid of blemishes over night. Pair it with matching toner for best results. I haven't had to use zit patches or medication on my face since using this for months. I only use it before bed but its enough to take care of excess oil so I can use different moisturizer in morning if I want

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and great for persistent breakouts
reviews.reviewText: This real helps when I’m breaking out from stress and hormonal fluctuations. It’s very lightweight so I use it more like a serum under a more substantial moisturizer, like Dr. Jart or Murad or Cerave . Definitely a staple in my skincare routine, day and night!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Imma always buy this
reviews.reviewText: I like this product. I have oily skin and this works for me. It's the first time I try it but seems great. Gel is the way to go for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best skincare product ever
reviews.reviewText: I got a trial size of this product in an Ipsy bag a few months ago, and had been hoarding every drop. I have HORRIBLE blemish and combo skin and have tried everything!! Within days my skin is healthier, clearing and not dried out like other traditional acne products do. I absolutely love it!!! Size is a value for the price imo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps with oily skin
reviews.reviewText: I am actually really amazed by how much it helps with my oily skin, just hope it continues to work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This does not dry my skin yet keeps me from getting oily
reviews.reviewText: This doesn’t make my skin dry but it still keeps me from getting oily! I have combination skin and acne & this product is great for me. It’s a hidden gem I love it
